Package com.intellij.psi.codeStyle

Interface FormattingModeAwareIndentAdjuster

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CodeStyleManagerImpl

    public interface FormattingModeAwareIndentAdjuster
    Used to differentiate between line indent adjustment on a new line after Enter and explicit indent adjustment action.
    See Also:
    FormattingMode, CodeStyleManager

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int adjustLineIndent(Document document, int offset, FormattingMode mode)
      Adjust line indent at document offset using mode.
      FormattingMode getCurrentFormattingMode() 

    • Method Detail

      • adjustLineIndent

        int adjustLineIndent(Document document,
                     int offset,
                     FormattingMode mode)
        Adjust line indent at document offset using mode.
        Parameters:
        document - The document to adjust line indent in.
        offset - The offset in the document.
        mode - The mode: FormattingMode.ADJUST_INDENT or FormattingMode.ADJUST_INDENT_ON_ENTER
        Returns:
        Adjusted offset.

      • getCurrentFormattingMode

        FormattingMode getCurrentFormattingMode()
